db:partintro.db:para: Now that we have examined the structured writing algorithms, it is time to look at structures in more depth. Once you decide to adopt structured writing, all of your content has to be expressed in structures. This creates issues with representation and functional lucidity, which I examine in this section, looking at how the approach to structure for each domain differs, and the impact those differences make to process, rhetoric, and functional lucidityconceptfunctional lucidityfunctional lucidity.
